summary: Tested SEO editors in Admin panel for India Expansion, Consulting, and Digital Marketing pages. Admin panel SEO editors work correctly - all fields visible and editable, save functionality works. However, CMS SEO values are not being properly rendered on the frontend pages via react-helmet.

integration_issues.flow: CMS SEO data not rendering on service pages
integration_issues.issue: SEO values saved in Admin CMS are not overriding defaults in useSiteContent.js. Page titles show default values, meta descriptions show index.html default, keywords and OG tags not rendered.

action_items: Fix CMS SEO data not being properly merged/used by frontend pages - the deepMerge in useSiteContent.js may not be working correctly for SEO fields
Verify react-helmet is properly updating meta description, keywords, and OG tags (currently only title is being set)
Check if there's a timing issue where Helmet renders before CMS data is fetched
critical_code_review_comments: Admin.js SEO Settings sections are correctly implemented for all service pages (India Expansion, Consulting, Digital Marketing)
IndiaExpansion.js, Consulting.js, DigitalMarketing.js all have proper Helmet implementation with fallback defaults
useSiteContent.js deepMerge function may have issue with merging SEO objects - CMS values not overriding defaults
The SEO data IS being saved to database (verified via API) but not being used by frontend

success_rate.backend: 100% - API endpoints working, SEO data persists correctly
success_rate.frontend: 70% - Admin SEO editors work, but CMS SEO values not rendering on public pages

seed_data_creation: Added TEST SEO values to India Expansion page for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin panel SEO editors verified working for India Expansion, Consulting, Digital Marketing. Issue found: CMS SEO values saved to database but not rendering on frontend pages. The deepMerge function in useSiteContent.js may need debugging. Test data with 'TEST' keyword was saved to India Expansion SEO fields.

features_tested.admin_india_expansion_seo_editor: PASS - All 5 SEO fields visible and editable (Page Title, Meta Description, Keywords, OG Image, Canonical URL)
features_tested.admin_consulting_seo_editor: PASS - All 5 SEO fields visible and editable
features_tested.admin_digital_marketing_seo_editor: PASS - All 5 SEO fields visible and editable
features_tested.admin_save_seo_content: PASS - Save All button works, 'Saved!' confirmation shown, data persists to database
features_tested.india_expansion_page_seo_meta_tags: PARTIAL - Title set by react-helmet (default value), meta description NOT updated, keywords NOT rendered
features_tested.consulting_page_seo_meta_tags: PARTIAL - Title set by react-helmet (default value), meta description NOT updated, keywords NOT rendered
features_tested.digital_marketing_page_seo_meta_tags: PARTIAL - Title set by react-helmet (default value), meta description NOT updated, keywords NOT rendered

api_verification.site_content_api: PASS - Returns SEO data correctly including TEST values saved via Admin
